data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 141 believers living in the state of La Massana. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Massana, Andorra

data.prayer: Father, help the 141 believers in La Massana to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in La Massana, Andorra.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, may the churches in La Massana, Andorra honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to La Massana, Andorra.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of La Massana.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of La Massana prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of La Massana, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.
